initialize_object_list¶

orbitpy.util.initialize_object_list(inp, cls)[source]¶
Utility function to return list of objects from a valid input (a single object or list of objects where each object is of the class cls).

If invalid input None is returned.

Parameters

  • inp ((list, cls) or cls) – Input.

  • cls (cls) – Class of each element of the list.

Returns

List of objects if valid input else None.

Return type

list, cls or None
